Row.Text: With a newly finished Launch Pad in {1_CityName}, {2_LeaderName} is one step closer to unraveling the mysteries of the heavens. If the stars are to be our destiny, we must begin construction of our own Launch Pad at once.

The thrum of machines from {1_LeaderName} is rapidly becoming the pulse of the world's economy; they have just become the world's first Railroad Tycoon. Build more Factories if our own products are to compete!
Foreign Leader is Earliest Railroad Tycoon

You have a Nuclear Weapon available but no way to deploy it! To use the Nuclear Weapon we must have a Bomber based in an Aerodrome, Squadron or Carrier Commander. Once they have a Bomber, that Commander can perform the WMD Strike action once for each Nuclear Weapon we have produced.
